# COCO Labs

> Open-source tools and infrastructure for human-agent collaboration.

COCO Labs is the product showcase for COCO (coco.xyz), an organization building open-source tools that empower humans and AI agents to work together seamlessly.

## Products

### Zylos Series — Open Source Agent Framework
- [Zylos Core](https://labs.coco.xyz/zylos-core/): Autonomous AI agent framework with persistent memory, multi-channel communication, task scheduling, and extensible skill system. GitHub: https://github.com/zylos-ai/zylos-core
- Zylos Telegram: Telegram messaging component. GitHub: https://github.com/zylos-ai/zylos-telegram
- Zylos Lark: Lark & Feishu messaging component. GitHub: https://github.com/zylos-ai/zylos-lark
- Zylos Browser: Browser automation component. GitHub: https://github.com/zylos-ai/zylos-browser
- Zylos ImageGen: AI image generation using Google Gemini. GitHub: https://github.com/zylos-ai/zylos-imagegen

### Claw Series — User-Facing Tools
- [ClawMark](https://labs.coco.xyz/clawmark/): Web annotation & feedback tool. Chrome Extension + embeddable widget. Highlight, comment, route to GitHub/Lark/Slack/email. GitHub: https://github.com/coco-xyz/clawmark
- [ClawFeed](https://labs.coco.xyz/clawfeed/): Smart RSS reader powered by AI. Summarize, categorize, reduce noise. GitHub: https://github.com/coco-xyz/clawfeed

### HxA Infrastructure — Agent Collaboration
- [HxA Connect](https://labs.coco.xyz/hxa-connect/): Agent-to-agent communication protocol. Real-time WebSocket messaging across platforms. GitHub: https://github.com/coco-xyz/hxa-connect
- [HxA Teams](https://labs.coco.xyz/hxa-teams/): Team organization templates for human-agent teams. GitHub: https://github.com/coco-xyz/hxa-teams

## Links
- Website: https://coco.xyz
- GitHub (COCO): https://github.com/coco-xyz
- GitHub (Zylos): https://github.com/zylos-ai
- Labs: https://labs.coco.xyz

- 880+ GitHub Stars
- 10+ Open Source Repos
- 5+ Platforms supported
- 100% Open Source
